author: newsr.in
title: EPL 2015: Twitter reacts to Man Utd's 3-0 loss to Arsenal - newsR
text: On Sunday night, in the clash of the heavyweights, Arsene Wenger's Arsenal came out with flying colours as the Gunners thrashed Manchester United 3-0 at the Emirates. Chilean Alexis Sanchez scored the first goal with a brilliant backheel filck after which Mesut Ozil scored a second within 33 seconds. Â»
